name: FNF Girlfriend Test | FNF GF Test [HTML5 - Works on mobile]
name_original: FNF Girlfriend Test | FNF GF Test [HTML5 - Works on mobile]
description:
FNF GF Test is here! Test the Girlfriend from Friday Night Funkin' and see her in action!

[HTML5 - Works on mobile]

Sweetheart is Boyfriend's accomplice and the girl of Daddy Dearest and Mommy Mearest. She is normally seen sitting on top of the speakers, bopping her head to the beat of the music, applauding Boyfriend, and monitoring combos. 

Her tracks incorporate Tutorial, where she shows players how to play the game.

Read more here.

As you know, Girlfriend is not a playable character, so, we have her vocals just in the first phase/animation.

Hit the icon or N for other animations of FNF GF. Keep in mind that this is an FNF Test game, and all you can do is listen to instrumental and make vocals.

If you like it, leave a comment.

--
